ReportQuery.Fields: b.BA1_CODCCO, b.BA1_MATANT, p.BI3_CODIGO, p.BI3_DESCRI, b.BA1_NOMUSR, CASE WHEN NVL(length(trim(f.BA1_DATCAR)), 0) = 0 THEN null WHEN NVL(length(trim(f.BA1_DATCAR)), 0) > 0 THEN to_date(trim(f.BA1_DATCAR),'YYYYMMDD') END BA1_DATCAR, CASE WHEN NVL(length(trim(f.BA1_DATBLO)), 0) = 0 THEN null WHEN NVL(length(trim(f.BA1_DATBLO)), 0) > 0 THEN to_date(trim(f.BA1_DATBLO),'YYYYMMDD') END BA1_DATBLO, CASE WHEN NVL(length(trim(b.BA1_DTVLCR)), 0) = 0 THEN null WHEN NVL(length(trim(b.BA1_DTVLCR)), 0) > 0 THEN to_date(trim(b.BA1_DTVLCR),'YYYYMMDD') END BA1_DTVLCR
ReportQuery.From: VW_PR_USUARIO b, VW_PR_USUARIO f, VW_PR_PRODUTO_SAUDE p
ReportQuery.FixedFilter: trim(b.BA1_CODINT) = trim(f.BA3_CODINT) AND trim(b.BA1_CODEMP) = trim(f.BA3_CODEMP) AND trim(b.BA1_MATRIC) = trim(f.BA3_MATRIC) AND trim(f.BA3_CODPLA) = trim(p.BI3_CODIGO) and trim(f.BA1_DATCAR) = (SELECT max(trim(f2.BA1_DATCAR)) from TOTVSPRD12.BA1010 f2 WHERE trim(f.BA1_CODINT) = trim(f2.BA1_CODINT) and trim(f.BA1_CODEMP) = trim(f2.BA1_CODEMP) and trim(f.BA1_MATRIC) = trim(f2.BA1_MATRIC) and trim(f.BA1_TIPREG) = trim(f2.BA1_TIPREG)) AND b.D_E_L_E_T_ not like '%*%'
